hooks.command: command -v terminal-notifier >/dev/null && terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -message 'Permission requested' -sound default
command -v terminal-notifier >/dev/null && terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -message 'Task completed' -sound default
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "c" using {command down, option down}'

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); time=$(date +%H:%M:%S); git_branch=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false -c core.fsmonitor=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "\033[36m(\033[32m%s\033[36m) on \033[32m%s \033[36m(\033[33m%s\033[36m) (\033[36m%s\033[90m@\033[32m%s\033[36m)" "$(basename "$dir")" "$git_branch" "$time" "$user" "$host"; else printf "\033[36m(\033[32m%s\033[36m) (\033[33m%s\033[36m) (\033[36m%s\033[90m@\033[32m%s\033[36m)" "$(basename "$dir")" "$time" "$user" "$host"; fi
